   - No apple there.

All four moves are safe immediately.  

**Consider enemy movement:**

If enemy moves LEFT to (3, 6), that’s not a threat to me this turn unless I move to (3, 6) — I’m not.

RIGHT to (3, 5) — neutral.  

Best is LEFT to eat apple now.

**Final move:**
